alert.note: Alert for Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Polk; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Sumter, eastern Pasco, northwestern Polk and northeastern Hillsborough Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 115 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dade City to near Hillsborough River State Park. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Zephyrhills, Dade City, St. Leo, Zephyrhills West, Hillsborough River State Park, Pebble Creek, Zephyrhills North, Zephyrhills South, Wesley Chapel South, San Antonio, Saint Leo, Rockridge, Zephyrhills Municipal Airport, Wesley Chapel, Richland, Blanton, New Tampa, Meadow Pointe, Dade City North and Crystal Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Polk; Sumter
